title: Captain Feathersword the friendly pirate
creator_credit: Wiggles Touring Pty Ltd, Paul Field and Chisholm McTavish
brief_description: Come and dance and have lots of fun with Captain Feathersword and his friend The Wiggles, Wags the Dog, Dorothy the Dinosaur, Henry the Octopus, Officer Beaples and his pirate shipmates. Take a trip down memory lane with the Captain as he tries to teach old Wags the Dog some new tricks (and Wags teaches the Captain some magic), dances with his nephew, Captain No-beard, and follow the Wiggles as they help the Captain learn to count to ten!
